entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
